title: Tap Back Rule
description:
Jay has started up a weekly basketball game and gives Dan the rundown of the event. The guys reminisce about their abilities from their school day's sports. Jacob, Black Lou and DJ Lou challenge Jay to a game of horse.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com
